text: No oni prodolzhali uporstvovat' v svoyom oproverzhenii yego poslaniya, schitaya yego lzhetsom, i Allakh naslal na nikh sil'neyshiy znoy, ot kotorogo oni staralis' spastis'. No ne bylo dlya nikh zashchity ot nego, poka bol'shoye oblako ne zakrylo ikh ot solntsa, i oni ukrylis' pod nim. No togda Allakh nizvol yego, kak ogon', na nikh i pogubil ikh vsekh v etot strashnyy den'
